mapper.select: select id, supplier_name, address, first_kind_id, first_kind_name, second_kind_id, second_kind_name, third_kind_id, third_kind_name, former_name, bank_type, bank_account, url, phone, fax, postal_code, area_id, area_name, rank_id, rank_name, first_contacts, first_department, first_duty, first_office_phone, first_phone, first_family_phone, first_email, first_sex, second_contacts, second_department, second_duty, second_office_phone, second_phone, second_family_phone, second_email, second_sex, billing_information, supply_gather, recommend_gather, register_number, register, register_time, buyer_number, buyer, checker, check_time, check_tag, changer, change_time, change_tag, delete_tag from erp.supplier_file where id = #{id}

select id, supplier_name, address, first_kind_id, first_kind_name, second_kind_id, second_kind_name, third_kind_id, third_kind_name, former_name, bank_type, bank_account, url, phone, fax, postal_code, area_id, area_name, rank_id, rank_name, first_contacts, first_department, first_duty, first_office_phone, first_phone, first_family_phone, first_email, first_sex, second_contacts, second_department, second_duty, second_office_phone, second_phone, second_family_phone, second_email, second_sex, billing_information, supply_gather, recommend_gather, register_number, register, register_time, buyer_number, buyer, checker, check_time, check_tag, changer, change_time, change_tag, delete_tag from erp.supplier_file limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into erp.supplier_file(supplier_name, address, first_kind_id, first_kind_name, second_kind_id, second_kind_name, third_kind_id, third_kind_name, former_name, bank_type, bank_account, url, phone, fax, postal_code, area_id, area_name, rank_id, rank_name, first_contacts, first_department, first_duty, first_office_phone, first_phone, first_family_phone, first_email, first_sex, second_contacts, second_department, second_duty, second_office_phone, second_phone, second_family_phone, second_email, second_sex, billing_information, supply_gather, recommend_gather, register_number, register, register_time, buyer_number, buyer, checker, check_time, check_tag, changer, change_time, change_tag, delete_tag) values (#{supplierName}, #{address}, #{firstKindId}, #{firstKindName}, #{secondKindId}, #{secondKindName}, #{thirdKindId}, #{thirdKindName}, #{formerName}, #{bankType}, #{bankAccount}, #{url}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{postalCode}, #{areaId}, #{areaName}, #{rankId}, #{rankName}, #{firstContacts}, #{firstDepartment}, #{firstDuty}, #{firstOfficePhone}, #{firstPhone}, #{firstFamilyPhone}, #{firstEmail}, #{firstSex}, #{secondContacts}, #{secondDepartment}, #{secondDuty}, #{secondOfficePhone}, #{secondPhone}, #{secondFamilyPhone}, #{secondEmail}, #{secondSex}, #{billingInformation}, #{supplyGather}, #{recommendGather}, #{registerNumber}, #{register}, #{registerTime}, #{buyerNumber}, #{buyer}, #{checker}, #{checkTime}, #{checkTag}, #{changer}, #{changeTime}, #{changeTag}, #{deleteTag})
mapper.update:
update erp.supplier_file
supplier_name = #{supplierName},
address = #{address},
first_kind_id = #{firstKindId},
first_kind_name = #{firstKindName},
second_kind_id = #{secondKindId},
second_kind_name = #{secondKindName},
third_kind_id = #{thirdKindId},
third_kind_name = #{thirdKindName},
former_name = #{formerName},
bank_type = #{bankType},
bank_account = #{bankAccount},
url = #{url},
phone = #{phone},
fax = #{fax},
postal_code = #{postalCode},
area_id = #{areaId},
area_name = #{areaName},
rank_id = #{rankId},
rank_name = #{rankName},
first_contacts = #{firstContacts},
first_department = #{firstDepartment},
first_duty = #{firstDuty},
first_office_phone = #{firstOfficePhone},
first_phone = #{firstPhone},
first_family_phone = #{firstFamilyPhone},
first_email = #{firstEmail},
first_sex = #{firstSex},
second_contacts = #{secondContacts},
second_department = #{secondDepartment},
second_duty = #{secondDuty},
second_office_phone = #{secondOfficePhone},
second_phone = #{secondPhone},
second_family_phone = #{secondFamilyPhone},
second_email = #{secondEmail},
second_sex = #{secondSex},
billing_information = #{billingInformation},
supply_gather = #{supplyGather},
recommend_gather = #{recommendGather},
register_number = #{registerNumber},
register = #{register},
register_time = #{registerTime},
buyer_number = #{buyerNumber},
buyer = #{buyer},
checker = #{checker},
check_time = #{checkTime},
check_tag = #{checkTag},
changer = #{changer},
change_time = #{changeTime},
change_tag = #{changeTag},
delete_tag = #{deleteTag},
where id = #{id}
